criteria.logical_test: open_type in ['ABOVE_VA'] and tpo in [7,8,9,10,11] and strength >= 20 and strength <= 40 and kind in ['PE']
open_type in ['BELOW_VA'] and tpo in [1,3,4,5,6] and strength >= 20 and strength <= 50 and kind in ['PE', 'CE']
open_type in ['GAP_DOWN'] and tpo in [3,4,5,6,7,8,9] and money_ness in ['ITM_1', 'ITM_2', 'ITM_3']
open_type in ['GAP_UP'] and tpo in [3] and kind in ['PE', 'CE']
